Hi Richard - 

"Nobody here but us chickens" as the old saying goes...yes, =
it's been downright dead on all the lists. Guess it's the summer doldrums (=
or winter doldrums) or something. Been spending more hours on my antique be=
er steins (and some time with the more usable ones, too) instead of swords =
and fittings. Things might get more active soon. I've got my ticket for the=
 SF show in four weeks and also plan on going back to Japan in late October=
, my second adventure there. Then we have our KTK weekend coming up in Sept=
ember. 

Ron
STL
